title: Filthy Farm Jobs | Philip Learns to Milk Cows | S1E2

tasks.task: Milk cows on a dairy farm
subtasks: Approach the cow while being cautious
Apply pre-dip to the cow's udder
Dry the cow's udder with towels
Attach the milking machine to the cow
Collect the milk and handle it properly

tasks.task: Operate the dairy farm milking system
subtasks: Monitor milking equipment
Ensure milk is cooled and stored properly
Check cow stalls and ensure cleanliness
Ensure cows have access to water and feed
Schedule milking times to meet market requirements
Coordinate milk pickup with marketing block

tasks.task: Work with government affairs to support dairy farmers
subtasks: Attend meetings with state legislators
Advocate for policies supporting dairy farming

tasks.task: Demonstrate cow milking to a new employee
subtasks: Show proper techniques for handling the cow
Explain the milking process step-by-step
Supervise and evaluate new employee's performance
